result.longName: Burçelik Bursa Çelik Döküm Sanayii A.S.

assetProfile.address1: Organize Sanayi BOelgesi Sar Cadde No:15
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Burçelik Bursa Çelik Döküm Sanayii A.S. designs, manufactures, and markets steel castings, mining machinery, and valves in Turkey and internationally. It offers stationary plant products, including jaw crushers; impact and cone crushers; dry vibrating screens; sand machines; vertical impact crushers; hammer crushers; and crushing-screening plant systems, such as bunkers, feeders, conveyor belts, intermediate and stock silos, and plant automation systems. The company also provides mobile jaw crushers, mobile impact crushers, mobile cone crushers, mobile screens, and mobile padders. In addition, it offers foundry products comprising supporting rolls, breaker plates, rotor assemblies, roller mantles, and roller crusher products for the cement industry; and plain carbon and stainless-steel parts for hydroelectric power plants, as well as pelton and Franscis turbine runners, turbine blades, wicket gates, stay and speed rings, and butterfly valve parts. In addition, it offers stern tube bosses, rudder parts, marine engine crankshaft housings, and assorted cast parts for the maritime industries; butterfly valve bodies, discs, and other valve accessories; earth moving and general machinery; and mining and crushing machines. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Bursa, Turkey. Burçelik Bursa Çelik Döküm Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Halka arz.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Meryem Gündogdu Atilgan
